dmca.title: DUPLICATE
dmca.body:
Roxana Fitch
via C. Colombo, 2/2
40033 Casalecchio di Reno BO Italy

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043


April 7, 2006
I, Roxana Fitch, am availing myself of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to report the following infringement on my copyright:
The copyrighted work at issue no longer appears on http://www.jergasdehablahispana.org/index.htm, as the format has been changed to a word-search type of viewing (due to constant plagiarism by others), but said text ("Jergas de habla hispana") as originally appeared online is filed by the US Copyright with copyright no. TXu1-273-119. The text itself was created in October 1997. I still have the .htm files (mexico.htm, mexico2.htm, mexico3.htm, espana.htm, espana2.htm, bolivia.htm, chile.htm, colombia.htm, venezuela.htm and Uruguay.htm) as they appeared online up to 31 March 2006. 
The material that is infringing the copyrighted work listed above is displayed in 
http://www.flakozitas.com.ar/paises/jergas/jerbolivia.htm, http://www.flakozitas.com.ar/paises/jergas/jerchile.htm http://www.flakozitas.com.ar/paises/jergas/jermexico.htm http://www.flakozitas.com.ar/paises/jergas/jermexico2.htm http://www.flakozitas.com.ar/paises/jergas/jercolombia.htm 
http://www.flakozitas.com.ar/paises/jergas/jeruruguay.htm http://www.flakozitas.com.ar/paises/jergas/jerespagna.htm http://www.flakozitas.com.ar/paises/jergas/jeruruguay.htm
The search query I used was the sentence "jergas de habla hispana". The fourth result I obtained with Google is:
Diccionarios de Jerqas del Habia Hispana --Villa FlakoZitas -- [ Translate this page
Diccionarios de Jerga de habla Hispana. Lunfardo Portefio, jergas de Colombia, Chile, Espana, Mexico, Pent, Venezuela y Uruguay.
www.flakozitas.com.ar/paises/jergas/- 11k - Cached- Similar pages
You may contact me either at webmaster@jergasdehablahispana or roxanaf@fastweb.net.it The infringing webpage's webmaster is Fernando Prats, and the email listed in the website is webmaster@flakozitas.com.ar
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by myself, that is, the copyright owner, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Roxana Fitch

DA: CASALECCHIO	N.FAX 0516133798	10 APR. 2006 14:14 		P1
